Steps: Navigate to login page and enter valid username and password then click submit
Expected Result: User should be redirected to dashboard

Steps: Navigate to login page and enter valid username with wrong password
Expected Result: Error message should display saying invalid credentials

Steps: Click on search bar and type product name then press enter
Expected Result: Search results should display matching products

Steps: Browse to product page and click Add to Cart button
Expected Result: Item should appear in shopping cart with correct quantity

Steps: Go to cart and click checkout then fill shipping details
Expected Result: Order confirmation page should display with order number

Steps: Submit contact form with empty required fields
Expected Result: Validation errors should appear for each required field

Steps: Click on each main navigation item
Expected Result: Each page should load without errors
Layout should adapt to mobile view without breaking

Steps: Click forgot password and enter email
Expected Result: Password reset email should be sent

Steps: Click logout button from user menu
Expected Result: User should be redirected to login page and session cleared
